name: 奥斯卡·查克
introduction: Oscar Chark is a Canadian actor born and raised in Vancouver, BC. After taking classes for a few years he was discovered by an agency and quickly booked his first role. Oscar has fallen in love with the craft and works everyday to become a better actor. So far in his career he has booked roles in various film and TV projects.Most notably, he has worked on "Riverdale" and "Yellowjackets" and has upcoming roles in Adam Sandler's "You Are So Not Invited to my Bat Mitzvah" as a "Jewish Stud" named Jacob, an upcoming Musical Film where he sings classic Broadway songs to showcase his Musical Talents and a Christmas Horror movie called "It's a Wonderful Knife".
